item.description:
Party Update - 103 attendees confirmed with another 25 guests still undecided. - Phil Lee (May 15, 2005)
--------------

I want to celebrate Boston Ecademy's One Year Anniversary in style. I will open up my house to members for this Meeting/Party. If you attend one networking event in 2005, this is the one! You will meet great people and have a great time, what more can you ask for?

Since this will be a party, I will be inviting more of my executive friends and colleagues. Please feel free to invite your friends as well.

Target for this event is 100 people!

AS I AM HOLDING THIS AT MY HOME AND CATERING THE EVENT, I AM ASKING MEMBERS TO RSVP BY MAY 14TH.

DIRECTIONS TO MY HOUSE WILL BE PROVIDED ONLY TO THOSE WHO RSVP. AFTER YOU RSVP ON THIS SITE, I WILL BE SENDING YOU AN EVITE INVITATION FOR THE PARTY.

Let's make this celebration a huge success.

- Phil

For more information, see http://www.ecademy.co...
item.name: Boston Ecademy May Meetup - One Year Anniversary Party
